docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Oct. 1--President Roosevelt today told a military group representing many of the other republics in the Western Hemisphere that the American defense program was a matter of "one for all and all for one." The visitors in their turn assured...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 1--President Roosevelt today told a military group representing many of the other republics in the Western Hemisphere that the American defense program was a matter of "one for all and all for one." The visitors in their turn assured the President that their countries were pledged to support a continuance of American ideals.

headline.main: HEMISPHERE GROUP VISITS PRESIDENT; He Tells Army Men From Other American Republics Defense Is Our Common Problem 'ONE FOR ALL, ALL FOR ONE' Invited by General Marshall, Visitors Start Today by Air to Observe Our Program Visit White House in Uniform Common Problem, Says President Review Fort Myer Garrison
